lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The new financing for Italfunding, being syndicated among about five major international banks, will be a fully underwritten, revolving facility with an average life of seven years and the facility will fund the loan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The bankers noted that if the financing had been arranged in Italy, the cost to Mexico and the Italian banks would have been higher since the Italian banks would use a different source of funding.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: All Paris Club agreements contain a generally accepted outline for a rescheduling, but the specific terms must then be negotiated on a bilateral basis.
